files.name: demo-sidebar-group.svelte
files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import * as Sidebar from "$lib/registry/ui/sidebar/index.js";
	import LifeBuoyIcon from "@lucide/svelte/icons/life-buoy";
	import SendIcon from "@lucide/svelte/icons/send";
</script>

<Sidebar.Provider>
	<Sidebar.Root>
		<Sidebar.Content>
			<Sidebar.Group>
				<Sidebar.GroupLabel>Help</Sidebar.GroupLabel>
				<Sidebar.GroupContent>
					<Sidebar.Menu>
						<Sidebar.MenuItem>
							<Sidebar.MenuButton>
								<LifeBuoyIcon />
								Support
							</Sidebar.MenuButton>
						</Sidebar.MenuItem>
						<Sidebar.MenuItem>
							<Sidebar.MenuButton>
								<SendIcon />
								Feedback
							</Sidebar.MenuButton>
						</Sidebar.MenuItem>
					</Sidebar.Menu>
				</Sidebar.GroupContent>
			</Sidebar.Group>
		</Sidebar.Content>
	</Sidebar.Root>
</Sidebar.Provider>
